reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]
reload.description: Reloads command line configuration from the YAML-configuration.

platform_yaml_not_supported.title: Platform YAML is not supported for Command Line
platform_yaml_not_supported.description:
Platform YAML setup is not supported.
Change from configuring it in the `{platform}:` key to use the `command_line:` key directly in configuration.yaml.
See the documentation for details.
